data.title: Elegant Wits and Grand Horizontals: A Sparkling Panorama of La Belle Epoque : Its Gilded Society, Irrepressible Wits and Splendid Courtesans
data.meta_description: Hardcover. First edition. Illustrated with black and white photographic plates. Octavo. xvii, 262pp. Plates lightly toned in the top margins creating thin lines on the topedge, near fine in a very good dust jacket with modest edgewear, and a tanned spine. Inscribed by the author on half-title: For Arnold - With affection - Cornelia. Possibly referring to Arnold Weissberger, an entertainment lawyer known for throwing parties for A-list celebrities.
data.text:
Hardcover. First edition. Illustrated with black and white photographic plates. Octavo. xvii, 262pp. Plates lightly toned in the top margins creating thin lines on the topedge, near fine in a very good dust jacket with modest edgewear, and a tanned spine. Inscribed by the author on half-title: "For Arnold - With affection - Cornelia." Possibly referring to Arnold Weissberger, an entertainment lawyer known for throwing parties for A-list celebrities.

Item #470251
